name: Dr. Asima Pradhan
title: Founder & Director
bio: Visionary leader with a deep expertise in biophotonics and medical device development.
fullBio: Dr. Pradhan is the driving force behind our groundbreaking technology, aiming to make diagnostics universally accessible.

name: Dr. P.K. Panigrahi
title: Director
bio: Expert in strategic planning and corporate governance for MedTech startups.
fullBio: With over 20 years of experience, Dr. Panigrahi provides invaluable guidance on strategic planning and partnerships.

name: Mrs. Subrata Mishra
title: CEO
bio: Leads the company's operational strategy and drives our mission forward.
fullBio: As CEO, Mrs. Mishra oversees all operational aspects of the company, ensuring we meet our strategic goals.

name: Mr. Shivam Shukla
title: CTO
bio: Architect of our AI-powered diagnostic platform and software solutions.
fullBio: Mr. Shukla leads our technology division, focusing on building robust and scalable AI models for our devices.

name: Dr. Urvija Sinha
title: Business Consultant
bio: Specializes in market analysis and commercialization strategies.
fullBio: Dr. Sinha is instrumental in shaping our business strategy, focusing on market analysis and regulatory pathways.

name: Mr. Yashoraj Tyagi
title: Business Advisor
bio: Provides expert advice on business development and strategic growth.
fullBio: Mr. Tyagi leverages his extensive industry experience to advise on key business development opportunities.

name: Dr. Amar Nath Sah
title: Consultant
bio: Clinical research consultant ensuring our products meet medical standards.
fullBio: Dr. Sah provides critical insights into the clinical application and validation of our diagnostic tools.

name: Ms. Bhagwati B. Deo
title: Data Analyst
bio: Manages and interprets the complex datasets from our clinical trials.
fullBio: Ms. Deo is at the heart of our data operations, performing the analysis that validates our technology's efficacy.
